title: Make your iPhone illegible with Paperclip by Paragraph :)
content:
Two free fonts from Paragraph were ported to the iPhone: [Tenby 5](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014044318/http:/iphoneruler.blogspot.com/2009/05/tenby-five-font.html) and [Paperclip](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014044318/http:/iphoneruler.blogspot.com/2009/05/paperclip-font.html). This is what you can achieve with them:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014044318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paper_5059.png)
author: paragraph
